itunes:author: iBooks
title: Steve Stoute: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: The entrepreneur, artist manager, and record exec talks about his book.
itunes:summary: Steve Stoute, marketing guru and author of The Tanning of America: How Hip-Hop Created a Culture That Rewrote the Rules of the New Economy, discusses his experiences connecting cultural icons with blue-chip marketers. The event was moderated by Josh Tyrangiel, editor-in-chief of Bloomberg Businessweek.
itunes:keywords: Steve Stoute, hip-hop, hip hop, The Tanning of America, sociology, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
